FuncDef: The upgrade pdu command upgrades the CANBUS software of a specified DMU slot.
CLIs: upgrade pdu slot <slodid> dmu { startup | <filename> } monitorbus [ force ]
upgrade pdu all dmu { startup | <filename> } monitorbus [ force ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the current startup system software is used for the upgrade.
-

Specifies the name of the system software stored in the CF card.
The value is a string of 4 to 127 characters, spaces not supported.

Forces the upgrade, regardless of the version consistency.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> upgrade pdu all dmu startup monitorbus force
*                     W A R N I N G                     *
* Please ensure that the configuration has been saved.  *
* And please ensure that the board does not be powered  *
* off or be reseted during the upgrade operation.       *
* Also ensure that any board of this device is not      *
* removed (pull out or plug in) during this process.    *
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check a PDU version, run the check version startup command. If a PDU version is inconsistent with that specified by the system software, run the upgrade pdu command to upgrade the PDU version.
Implementation Procedure
During upgrade pdu command execution, the system prompts you to enter Y or N for pre-upgrade confirmation.
Configuration Impact
Two methods are available for upgrading loaded items:
Upgrading loaded items without using the force parameter. The system checks whether the PDU version is consistent with that specified by the system software and upgrades only loaded items that are inconsistent.Upgrading loaded items using the force parameter. The system directly upgrades all loaded items without checking whether the PDU version is consistent with that specified by the system software.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
